definition: (old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Lucas Levia would love to play at Wembley for Liverpool.
sentences.chinese: 盧卡斯表示，他願意爲紅軍在溫布利球場比賽。

sentences.english: Hawking retired last year as the Lucasian Chair of Mathematics at Cambridge University after 30 years in the position.
sentences.chinese: 霍金去年從劍橋大學盧卡斯數學教授的職位上退休了。

sentences.english: For a DM, we have Lucas Leiva and Jay Spearing.
sentences.chinese: 獸腰我們有盧卡斯和斯皮靈。

sentences.english: Lucas says Mercy Corps used to hand out printed food vouchers.
sentences.chinese: 盧卡斯說美慈組織曾向難民分發打印好的食品代金券。

sentences.english: But there is, Dr Lockley and Dr Lucas realised, something missing from the picture.
sentences.chinese: 但洛克裏與盧卡斯博士明白，圖上遺漏了一些東西。

sentences.english: Lucas insists our No. 10 could be the key to success against United.
sentences.chinese: 盧卡斯堅信我們的小喬能夠成爲戰勝曼狗的關鍵因素。
盧卡斯是一名世界級的門將，我之前就這麼說過。

sentences.english: After completing my middle school, I studied for a year at the Lucas Secretarial College in London.
sentences.chinese: 中學畢業後，在倫敦盧卡斯祕書學院學了一年。

sentences.english: Liverpool had to do without Lucas Leiva because of injury.
sentences.chinese: 由於受傷，本場比賽盧卡斯沒有出場。

sentences.english: None of the Lucas family provides voice-acting for the series, however;
sentences.chinese: 不過，盧卡斯家族中沒有一個人爲這個系列配音。

sentences.english: At the age of 26, he was made Lucasian professor of mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 在26歲的年紀，他成爲盧卡斯數學教授。

sentences.english: Alternate between playing as Frank Lucas, the gangster, and Richie Roberts, the cop.
sentences.chinese: 輪流充當弗蘭克盧卡斯，歹徒，和凱莉羅伯茨，巡捕。

sentences.english: Lucas received plenty of praise for his performance on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 上週日盧卡斯的突出表現贏得了滿堂喝彩。

sentences.english: Papanoida's family members are based on Lucas' children.
sentences.chinese: 帕帕諾依達家人的設計基礎則是盧卡斯的子女們。

sentences.english: Now it is time to give Lucas, the male cat, his medicine.
sentences.chinese: 現在到了給那隻叫盧卡斯的公貓吃藥的時候了。

sentences.english: Lukas and Laura haven't got a garden.
sentences.chinese: 盧卡斯和勞拉沒有花園。

definition: Werther, opera by Jules Massenet/Werther, German masculine given name
